channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous stretch of road, 17th October
item.description:
Outside number 59 Shaw Green Lane. I have had my second near-miss in a fortnight due to cars parked where there used to be white lines, obstructing the view of oncoming traffic in both directions. This is the narrowest part of the whole road and that's why there used to be parking restrictions, but they're no longer visible. Please rectify before someone has a collision
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 17th October
item.description:
Traffic lights Timings are incorrect Timings for existing the road heading away from the airfield are not long enough, causing serious tail backs
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 17th October
item.description:
This is the narrowest part of Shaw Green Lane. Cars are parking where white lines used to be painted and as a result, oncoming traffic from both directions cannot see me or my neighbours exiting our driveways. I'm reporting today as I've just had my second near-miss in a fortnight. Unfortunately some properties have built onto the highway to plant hedging, and this has made this stretch even more narrow.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Drain cover is sinking, 17th October
item.description:
Near the junction of Windyridge Road and Swindon Road opposite 383
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 404, Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Narrow shared pathway caused by overgrown hedges, 17th October
item.description:
Shared path is a little overwhelmed with bushes and hedges taking the majority of the free space. This could be dangerous if pedestrians and/or cycles meet going opposing way. Could you please help increase the foot way to mitigate the potential risk? It will also help move vulnerable users space away from fast moving traffic. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 17th October
item.description:
"Hi Can you please raise an enquiry for the safety inspection team to attend and record any defects for repair? USRN 09401537 Road number 400856 Grid ref: 399664/214669 What3 words approx.: reddish.mile.regress Lower Hilcot Farm to A435 at Barncombe Bottom There are large potholes and general debris at this location. Many thanks Wendy"
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees causing issues, O/S 37, 17th October
item.description:
There are 2 trees, there is a hole in one tree and it is massive, this needs looking at. There is also a cherry tree next to it that seems to die and loose its leaves every year and comes back to life, this tree is clearly "sick".
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path misused by unlawful users problem, 17th October
item.description:
Reporting:path_misused_by_unlawful_users Someone with a dark blue ranger over vehicle is driving down the path to a field. This has happened several times this year and again this morning. The field has access off REDDINGS road. They are damaging the path.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 17th October
item.description:
Reporting:obstruction_caused_by_fence Vegetation along both alleyways by numbers 23 and 24 and 35 & 37. Alongside number 35 the fence is falling on top the alleyway causing a dangerous obstruction.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light is obscured by vegetation problem, 17th October

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 17th October

item.title: Footpath blocked, 16th October
item.description:
Rigid hedge or tree cuttings have been placed on the public footpath so as to clearly block or discourage people from using it. The fence to the travellers site is one side and a hedge the other so there is no way around it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Southam, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
